context_bundle.summary: Kustomize: Template-free K8s configuration customization. Base + overlays pattern. Built into kubectl (-k flag). Key features: patches (strategic merge, JSON), configMapGenerator, secretGenerator, namePrefix/nameSuffix, commonLabels, image transformers.

onboarding.quick_start: Kustomize: 1) Create base/ with kustomization.yaml listing resources, 2) Create overlays/dev/ and overlays/prod/, 3) Add patches and transformers per environment, 4) kubectl apply -k overlays/prod/.
common_patterns: Image override: images: [{name: myapp, newTag: v2.0.0}]
ConfigMap from file: configMapGenerator: [{name: config, files: [config.json]}]

known_errors.cause: Resource path in kustomization.yaml is incorrect
known_errors.solution: Use relative paths from kustomization.yaml location
known_errors.prevention: Run kustomize build . locally to validate before commit
